alert.note: Alert for Fort Tejon; Lake Isabella; Tehachapi Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 27 at 12:13AM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A FIRE WEATHER WATCH IS IN EFFECT FOR THE KERN COUNTY MOUNTAINS FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES. .Critical fire weather conditions are expected in the Kern County mountains from late Saturday night through Monday evening. The onset of northeasterly winds late Saturday night will result in rapid drying, with widespread minimum relative humidity values of 10 to 15 percent Sunday afternoon and Monday afternoon. The strongest winds are anticipated Sunday afternoon, with sustained northeast winds of 20 to 30 mph, with frequent gusts near 40 mph. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY NORTHEAST WINDS AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 595, 596, AND 597... The National Weather Service in Hanford has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from late Saturday night through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...The Kern County mountains. * WIND...The strongest winds are expected Sunday afternoon, with sustained northeast winds of 20 to 30 mph, with frequent gusts near 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values of 10 to 15 percent both Sunday afternoon and Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Fort Tejon; Lake Isabella; Tehachapi Area
